Welcome to simple_math’s documentation!¶

A collection of simple math operations

simple_math.poly_first(x, a0, a1)¶

The first order polynom

Parameters:
xinteger
a0integer
a1integer
Returns:
first order polynom: a0 + a1*x
simple_math.poly_second(x, a0, a1, a2)¶

The second order polynom

Parameters:
xinteger
a0integer
a1integer
a2integer
Returns:
second order polynom: a0 + a1*x + a2*(x**2)
simple_math.simple_add(a, b)¶

The sum of two numbers

Parameters:
ainteger
binteger
Returns:
sum of a and b

The division of two numbers

Parameters:

binteger
Returns:
a and b difference

The product of two numbers

Parameters:

binteger
Returns:
product of a and b

The difference of two numbers

Parameters:

binteger
Returns:
difference of a and b
